title: Missing Ward ( GingerBread Ward )
body: I Recently Got A Marble Malphite And A Gingerbread Ward From The Augment Cache That You Guys Have Released, I Found The Ward Cool And Decided To Get It For Orange Essence, For This, I Had To Sacrifice My Definitely Not Udyr Skin Shard, After I Got It, I Was Tempted To Play With It Immediately So I Started A Normal, But When I Went To Ward Selection, To My Horror There Was Nothing There At All, I Tried Relogging After That Game To Check Once More But It's Still Not There, Im Horrified By This Experience And Hope You Can Help Me.

replies.body: I'll second that as well. Logged in today and the Tomb Angel ward I usually use was missing. Thanks for the response.

We're aware of an issue with a few specific wards that are completely missing from both champ select and summoner profile. This is just a visual issue, so the ward does still exist on your account, it's just not usable at the moment. We're looking into a fix, but at the moment there's no workaround.

Let me know if you have any questions.
